title: AI for Disaster Response: Improving Emergency Management
description: A collaborative Omdena team of 34 AI experts and data scientists worked with the World Food Programme to build solutions to predict affected populations and create customized relief packages for disaster response.
skills: Python - Machine Learning - Streamlit - Data Visualization

title: Analyzing Domestic Violence and Online Harassment During COVID19
description: In this project, award-winning Red Dot Foundation partnered with Omdena to apply various AI and NLP tools to better understand domestic violence and online harassment trends during COVID19.
skills: Python - NPL - Topic Modeling - Machine Learning - Data Mining - Document Annotation

title: A Fantástica Fábrica de... Gastos..
description: Tool in which it is possible to understand the expenses of politicians in the state of Paraíba.
